item.title: VI Toolkit Extensions
item.description: Today I tested the VI Toolkit extensions.Â The VI Toolkit extensions are cmdlets that makes your life easier. Here are some functions of what the cmdlets can do: The VI toolkit extensions require PowerShell V2 CTP 2 and the VI Toolkit. Example: list all VMs by name and list the size of the snapshots Open VI-toolkit Connect-VIserver VCservername To add the extension, use the following command: Add-Module "D:\\Scripts\\viToolkitExtensions.psm1" Get-VM | Get-TkeSnapshotExtended | select Name, VM, SizeMB Output:
